io.mosip.registration.jobs

Class BaseJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.scheduling.quartz.QuartzJobBean
      • io.mosip.registration.jobs.BaseJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.quartz.Job
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeleteAuditLogsJob, KeyPolicySyncJob, MasterSyncJob, PacketSyncStatusJob, PreRegistrationDataSyncJob, PreRegistrationPacketDeletionJob, PublicKeySyncJob, RegistrationDeletionJob, RegistrationPacketSyncJob, RegistrationPacketVirusScanJob, RegUserMappingSyncJob, SynchConfigDataJob, UserDetailServiceJob, UserSaltSyncJob

    public abstract class BaseJob
extends org.springframework.scheduling.quartz.QuartzJobBean
    The class BaseJob was a quartzJobBean which gives the information of job and its functionalities.This class will get all the active jobids and run that particular jobs by calling that services.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    YASWANTH S

      • executeChildJob

        public void executeChildJob(String currentJobID,
                            Map<String,SyncJobDef> jobMap)
        If there is any job called by the currently running job then this method will gets called to finish the child jobs first
        Parameters:
        currentJobID - current job executing
        jobMap - is a job's map

      • syncTransactionUpdate

        public void syncTransactionUpdate(ResponseDTO responseDTO,
                                  String triggerPoint,
                                  String syncJobId)
        Once all the jobs are completed then this method will save this transaction in the table
        Parameters:
        responseDTO - - the ResponseDTO
        triggerPoint - - the trigger point which indicates whether manual or batch jobs
        syncJobId - - the sync job ID
